member.name: T:ColonizationResourceLib.ImageListEntry
member.summary: Represents an entry in the image list table.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ImageListEntry.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a new instace of ImageListEntry.
member.param: The byte array that contains the data for the entry.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ImageListEntry.StartAddress
member.summary: The byte offset of the starting point of this image entry's data in the data entry of the file.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ImageListEntry.Length
member.summary: The length of this image entry's data in the data entry of the file.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ImageListEntry.UShort1
member.summary: Unknown short value 1.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ImageListEntry.UShort2
member.summary: Unknown short value 2.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ImageListEntry.Width
member.summary: The width of the image, in pixels.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ImageListEntry.Height
member.summary: The height of the image, in pixels.

member.name: T:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSpriteFile
member.summary: A file containing Colonization sprite images.

member.name: T:ColonizationResourceLib.ColResourceFile
member.summary: A file containing Colonization image resources.

member.name: F:ColonizationResourceLib.ColResourceFile.palette
member.summary: The Colonization color palette to be used when rendering the image.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColResourceFile.#ctor(System.Byte[],ColonizationResourceLib.ColPalette)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of ColResourceFile.
member.param: A byte[] containing the contents of the file.
A Colonization color palette to be used when the file does not specify its own color palette or the color palette in the file is incomplete.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColResourceFile.GetPaletteImage
member.summary: Get an image that shows what the resource file's palette looks like.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColResourceFile.GetImage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets an image in the file.
member.param: The index of the image to retrieve.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColResourceFile.GetImageList
member.summary: Gets a list of images in the file. Each image in the file is represented by a string array containing the image Identifier and any other fields as appropriate. The first item in the list is always an image showing the color palette.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColResourceFile.ProcessMadsPackEntries(System.Collections.Generic.List{MadsPackLib.MadsPackEntry})
member.summary: Process any entries in the MADSPACK-compressed file that cannot be handled at the base-class level.
member.param: A List of all MadsPackEntry objects in the file.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ColResourceFile.HeaderData
member.summary: A byte[] containing the data for the file header.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ColResourceFile.PaletteData
member.summary: A byte[] containing the data for the color palette.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ColResourceFile.ImageData
member.summary: A byte[] containing the data for the image data itself.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSpriteFile.#ctor(System.Byte[],ColonizationResourceLib.ColPalette)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of ColSpriteFile.
member.param: A byte[] containing the contents of the file.
A Colonization color palette to be used when the file does not specify its own color palette or the color palette in the file is incomplete.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSpriteFile.GetImage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets an image in the file.
member.param: The index of the image to retrieve.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSpriteFile.GetImageList
member.summary: Gets a list of images in the file. Each image in the file is represented by a string array containing the image Identifier, the width in pixels, and the height in pixels. The first item in the list is always an image showing the color palette.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSpriteFile.ProcessMadsPackEntries(System.Collections.Generic.List{MadsPackLib.MadsPackEntry})
member.summary: Process any entries in the MADSPACK-compressed file that cannot be handled at the base-class level.
member.param: A List of all MadsPackEntry objects in the file.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSpriteFile.ImageListData
member.summary: A byte[] containing the data for the sprite image list table.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSpriteFile.ImageCount
member.summary: The number of sprite images in the file.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSpriteFile.ImageListEntries
member.summary: A list of entries in the sprite image list table.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSpriteFile.Sprites
member.summary: An array containing the sprite image objects defined in the file.

member.name: T:ColonizationResourceLib.ColResourceException
member.summary: An exception related to the data in a Colonization resource file.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColResourceException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new instance of ColResourceException.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: T:ColonizationResourceLib.ColPictureFile

member.summary: Creates a new instance of ColPictureFile.
member.param: A byte[] containing the contents of the file.
A Colonization color palette to be used when the file does not specify its own color palette or the color palette in the file is incomplete.

member.summary: Gets an image in the file.
member.param: The index of the image to retrieve.

member.summary: Gets a list of images in the file. Each image in the file is represented by a string array containing the image Identifier, the width in pixels, and the height in pixels. The first item in the list is always an image showing the color palette.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ColPictureFile.Size
member.summary: The Size of the picture represented in the file.

member.name: T:ColonizationResourceLib.ColPalette
member.summary: A Colonization color palette.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColPalette.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new Colonization color palette with the default color array (all transparent).

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColPalette.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a new Colonization color palette by processing the palette data byte[].
member.param: A byte[] containing the color palette data (three bytes per color, one each for red, blue, and green).

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColPalette.#ctor(ColonizationResourceLib.ColPalette,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a new Colonization color palette by first copying the colors from the default palette (if provided) and then processing the palette data byte[].
member.param: The default color palette. May be null.
A byte[] containing the color palette data (three bytes per color, one each for red, blue, and green).

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ColPalette.Entries
member.summary: An array of the Colors in the palette.

member.name: T:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSprite
member.summary: A Colonization sprite image.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSprite.#ctor(ColonizationResourceLib.ColPalette,System.Drawing.Size,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Create a new Colonization sprite image object.
member.param: The Colonization color palette used by this sprite image.
The Size of the sprite image.
A byte[] containing the sprite image data.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSprite.GetColor(System.Byte)
member.summary: Gets the color in the palette specified by the paletteIndex parameter.
member.param: The index into the palette at which to retrieve a Color.

member.name: M:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSprite.GetImage
member.summary: Creates an image from the Data property.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSprite.Size
member.summary: The Size of the sprite image.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSprite.Data
member.summary: A byte[] containing the sprite image data.

member.name: P:ColonizationResourceLib.ColSprite.Palette
member.summary: The Colonization color palette used by this sprite image.
